Description: This flag disables the default network policy controller in k3s. We will use Cilium as the CNI plugin, which comes with its own network policy controller.
This flag disables the default Flannel CNI plugin in k3s. Again, we will use Cilium as the CNI plugin.
This flag enables the secrets encryption feature in k3s. This is a security feature that encrypts the secrets stored in etcd.
We will not require Traefik as an Ingress Controller in our setup. We will use Cilium with the help of ServiceLB of k3s.
